title: Replace hero images with uploaded photos across pages

requirements.summary: Replace the AuthGate landing hero image by updating the existing generated asset while keeping the same public path.
acceptanceCriteria: AuthGate renders the hero image from /assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg (no broken images)
The previous hero image is no longer shown anywhere the AuthGate hero appears

file_operations.description: Replace the existing image file contents with the edited/cropped version derived from pexels-eberhardgross-2310641.jpg, preserving the exact filename and location so /assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg continues to resolve.
Verify AuthGate continues to reference the hero image at the immutable public path /assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg and does not reference any prior hero asset.

requirements.summary: Replace the default EvangelismPageShell hero image by updating the existing generated asset while keeping the same public path.
acceptanceCriteria: EvangelismPageShell renders the hero image from /assets/generated/evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png when showHero={true} and no heroOverride is provided
The previous evangelism hero image is no longer shown anywhere the default evangelism hero appears

file_operations.description: Replace the existing image file contents with the edited/cropped version derived from pexels-8moments-1183099.jpg, preserving the exact filename and location so /assets/generated/evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png continues to resolve.
Confirm the default heroSrc fallback remains /assets/generated/evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png and that the default hero behavior only applies when showHero={true} and no heroOverride is provided.

requirements.summary: Add a third static hero asset under /assets/generated/ and display it on at least one non-landing page via EvangelismPageShell heroOverride.
acceptanceCriteria: At least one additional page (besides AuthGate and the default EvangelismPageShell hero) displays the third uploaded image as a hero image
The new hero asset is served from a stable public path under /assets/generated/ and loads without errors

file_operations.description: Add a new generated hero image by cropping/resizing pexels-arnie-chou-304906-1229042.jpg into the new static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/topics-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg so it is served at /assets/generated/topics-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg.
Enable EvangelismPageShell hero on this page (showHero={true}) and pass heroOverride to use /assets/generated/topics-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg so this third image is displayed as a non-landing hero.
